Class GroupChatIntent

extends java.lang.Object
    Intent for group chat conversation
    Author:
    Jean-Marc AUFFRET

    • Field Detail

      • ACTION_NEW_INVITATION

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_NEW_INVITATION
        Broadcast action: a new group chat invitation has been received.

        Intent includes the following extras:

        • EXTRA_CONTACT containing the MSISDN of the contact sending the invitation.
        • EXTRA_DISPLAY_NAME containing the display name of the contact sending the invitation (extracted from the SIP address).
        • EXTRA_CHAT_ID containing the unique ID of the chat conversation.
        • EXTRA_SUBJECT containing the subject associated to the conversation.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_CONTACT

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_CONTACT
        MSISDN of the contact sending the invitation
        See Also:

        Display name of the contact sending the invitation (extracted from the SIP address)
        See Also:

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_CHAT_ID
        Unique ID of the chat conversation
        See Also:

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_SUBJECT
        Subject associated to the conversation (optional)
